title: Distance Software Engineering Project-Based Instructional Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental software development concepts (Agile methodology, SDLC, basic programming skills)
context.additional_context: A course focused on strengthening software engineering practical skills applicable to current work for in-service professionals. Enhanced interaction through web-based collaboration tools and real-time remote meetings

learning_goals: Learners can clearly define software project requirements with team members using remote collaboration tools
Learners can develop a software prototype within two weeks by applying agile methodologies in a PBL environment
Learners can identify over 80% of technical/managerial issues at each project stage through formative assessments and submit improvement plans
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
